item.title: [Free] Basthon
item.description: Basthon Play with python code, the python playground that works offline.

item.title: [Free] CodePan
item.description: CodePan Play with JS/CSS/HTML so simple it hurts, the web playground that works offline.

item.title: [Free] JupyterLite
item.description: JupyterLite JupyterLite is a JupyterLab distribution that runs entirely in the browser built from the ground-up using JupyterLab components and extensions.

item.title: [Free] Micro Studio
item.description: Micro Studio MicroStudio is a free game engine online. Create games, learn programming, play, share, prototype and jam!
